JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: Should be capable to complete a project in PHP by yourself as a core developer
EDUCATIONAL REQUIREMENTS: Graduation / Masters preferably in CSE, Mathematics, Accounting, Physics from any reputed universities.Educational qualification will be relaxed for the candidates having strong professional skill.
ADDITIONAL REQUIREMENTS: Highly proficient in any PHP Frameworks. Solid understanding in OOP, Data Structure & MySQL. Demonstrable knowledge of web technologies including HTML, CSS, Javascript, Vue, Bootstrap etc. Should have good knowledge in database design and queries. Will have to work on multiple projects individually or as a part of the team. Excellent analytical, problem solving and decision-making skills. Should be willing to learn new applications and work in highly challenging, creative projects. Good Communication Skills and Positive Attitude are MUST Should be familiar in both operating systems - Linux & Windows
COMPENSATION & AND OTHER BENEFITS: Yearly two festival bonuses. (Applicable after 6 months of joining.) Performance based yearly salary increment. Refreshment facilities. Friendly working environment.
